meanings.sent1: The knobbed handle was easy to grip.
meanings.sent2: The tree trunk was knobbed with small growths.
meanings.sent3: The knobbed surface felt like a bumpy road.
meanings.sent4: Her skin felt like a knobbed texture under my fingers.
meanings.sent5: The knobbed design on the vase made it stand out.

meanings.definition: Covered in knobs or rounded projections.
meanings.sent1: The knobbed surface of the rock was rough to touch.
meanings.sent2: The old door was knobbed with intricate carvings.
meanings.sent3: The knobbed pattern on the fabric looked like tiny hills.
meanings.sent4: The knobbed appearance of the fruit made it seem exotic.
meanings.sent5: The knobbed texture of the carpet provided extra grip.
